description: Submits the form (same as clicking the Submit button).

examples.description: Submits the form which its id is searchForm.
Submits the form which its index is 0 (counting from the first form in the DOM).
Submits the form found by the locator //form

name: SubmitForm

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The (zero based) index of the form or its id property value.

summary: Submits the form (same as clicking the Submit button).
